welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bagam, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning beaches, rich cultural heritage, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Bagam has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yong Kee Istimewa Soup Seafood
restaurants.description: Yong Kee Istimewa Soup Seafood is a soup spot located in the city.
restaurants.address: Komplek Hup Seng Blok A No.5-8 (Batam Center), Batam, Kepulauan Riau

restaurants.name: Bubur Ayam Bogor Pak Djaja
restaurants.description: Bubur Ayam Bogor Pak Djaja is a breakfast spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Batam.
restaurants.address: Jl. Ahmad Yani (Green Land), Kota Batam, Riau 29000

restaurants.name: Byza Cafe Grands Prestige
restaurants.description: Byza Cafe Grands Prestige is a café located in the city.
restaurants.address: Mega Mall Batam Centre (Jl. Engku Putri, Teluk Tering), Batam, Kepulauan Riau 29461

restaurants.name: Pasir Putih Food Court
restaurants.description: Pasir Putih Food Court is a food court located in the city.
restaurants.address: Komplek Ruko Trikarsa Equalita (Jalan Raja Haji Fisabilillah), Batam, Kepulauan Riau 29461

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly full-service airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly full-service airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly full-service airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 3 hours. After that, users can purchase additional access time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seletar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, providing exclusive and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly budget airlines and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
